overview: The short film draws attention to the lasting consequences of abuse and traumatic memories of childhood. With its visuals plotted against a poetic narration, the story takes us into the deep recesses of the protagonist's mind. Having been driven to the point of no return as a result of the abuse he was subjected to, he is about to end it once and for all. In a world where a bleak reality snuffs out any remnants of hope he may have had, what would be his eventual fate.
title: Damaged
